ComicInfo.Summary:
With the Power in hand, the team is divided! Mordecai, Rigby, and the whole park crew are thrust into battle with Finn and Jake to save the Candy Kingdom, while Marceline, Lumpy Space Princess, and Ice King are stuck in the Regular Show world!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Philip Murphy | 1 | B | Cover B | Philip Murphy | 2 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Derek Charm | 3 | Var | 1:10 Mash-Up Variant Cover | Ian McGinty (a) & Kelly Fitzpatrick (c) | 4 |
